summary: This bill, the "Improving SCRA Benefit Utilization Act," aims to enhance financial protections for servicemembers under the Servicemembers Civil Relief Act (SCRA). It mandates financial literacy training for service members to include information about consumer financial protections, particularly interest rate limits. The bill also requires notification of SCRA benefits to servicemembers upon entering service and during mobilization. Furthermore, it clarifies financial institutions' obligations to apply interest rate limitations and streamlines the submission of relevant documentation by servicemembers.
